code_SemperKI.connections.content.manageContent¶

Part of Semper-KI software

Silvio Weging 2024

Contains: Manages the content of the session and the database

Classes¶

ManageContent

Class that manages the content, either in session or in postgres

checkRightsForProject(projectID) → bool¶

Check if user may see project

Parameters:

  • functionName (str) – The name of the calling function

  • projectID (str) – The projectID of the project in question

Returns:

True if the user belongs to the rightful, false if not

Return type:

Bool

checkRightsForProcess(processID) → bool¶

Check if user may see process

Parameters:

processID (str) – The processID of the process in question

Returns:

True if the user belongs to the rightful, false if not

Return type:

Bool

checkRights(functionName) → bool¶

Check if user is logged in and function may be called

Parameters:

functionName (str) – The name of the calling function

Returns:

True if the user belongs to the rightful, false if not

Return type:

Bool

getCorrectInterface(functionName='')¶

Return the correct class interface

Parameters:

functionName (str) – The name of the calling function

Returns:

Either the session or the postgres interface

Return type:

ProcessManagementSession | ProcessManagementBase | None

getClient()¶

Get ID if logged in, “anonymous” if not

Returns:

String with clientID

str
